name: @cf/deepgram/flux
description: Flux is the first conversational speech recognition model built specifically for voice agents.

task.name: Automatic Speech Recognition
task.description: Automatic speech recognition (ASR) models convert a speech signal, typically an audio input, to text.

encoding.description: Encoding of the audio stream. Currently only supports raw signed little-endian 16-bit PCM.

sample_rate.description: Sample rate of the audio stream in Hz.

eager_eot_threshold.description: End-of-turn confidence required to fire an eager end-of-turn event. When set, enables EagerEndOfTurn and TurnResumed events. Valid Values 0.3 - 0.9.

eot_threshold.description: End-of-turn confidence required to finish a turn. Valid Values 0.5 - 0.9.

eot_timeout_ms.description: A turn will be finished when this much time has passed after speech, regardless of EOT confidence.

keyterm.description: Keyterm prompting can improve recognition of specialized terminology. Pass multiple keyterm query parameters to boost multiple keyterms.

mip_opt_out.description: Opts out requests from the Deepgram Model Improvement Program. Refer to Deepgram Docs for pricing impacts before setting this to true. https://dpgr.am/deepgram-mip

tag.description: Label your requests for the purpose of identification during usage reporting

output.description: Output will be returned as websocket messages.

request_id.description: The unique identifier of the request (uuid)

sequence_id.description: Starts at 0 and increments for each message the server sends to the client.

event.description: The type of event being reported.

turn_index.description: The index of the current turn

audio_window_start.description: Start time in seconds of the audio range that was transcribed

audio_window_end.description: End time in seconds of the audio range that was transcribed

transcript.description: Text that was said over the course of the current turn

word.description: The individual punctuated, properly-cased word from the transcript

confidence.description: Confidence that this word was transcribed correctly

end_of_turn_confidence.description: Confidence that no more speech is coming in this turn
